thread.title: Advisory: Oct. 17 Sacramento Ceremony Honors Fallen CA Firefighters
thread.title_full: Advisory: Oct. 17 Sacramento Ceremony Honors Fallen CA Firefighters - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Advisory: Oct. 17 Sacramento Ceremony Honors Fallen CA Firefighters
text:
California Fire Foundation
SACRAMENTO, Calif. , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- In the shadow of a deadly and destructive wildfire season in California , uniformed firefighters, family members and grateful citizens will come together in Sacramento later this month to pay tribute to those who have paid the ultimate price.
The California Firefighters Memorial Ceremony will honor the memory of 16 California firefighters, adding their names to nearly 1,300 currently inscribed on the California Firefighters Memorial. The October 17 th ceremony in Sacramento's Capitol Park features a solemn uniformed firefighter procession, flag presentations to families of the honorees and the traditional "Last Alarm" bell ringing ceremony. The public is invited to attend.
The California Firefighters Memorial and ceremony are funded through the non-profit California Fire Foundation .
WHAT: CALIFORNIA FIREFIGHTERS MEMORIAL CEREMONY AND PROCESSION
WHEN: Saturday, October 17, 2015 , 11:30am
WHERE : CA Firefighters Memorial, Capitol Park, State Capitol, Sacramento, CA
PROGRAM: Attorney General Kamala Harris
Jaime Camil , Actor, The CW's "Jane the Virgin"
Lou Paulson , President, California Professional Firefighters
Vince Wells , Fire Captain, Contra Costa Co. Fire Protection District
Tracey Hansen , President, California Fire Chiefs Association
HONOREE LIST, PHOTOS, BACKGROUND INFO : http://bit.ly/1MbRCqy
LIVE STREAM (beginning Sat. 10-17 at 11:30am ) : http://bit.ly/1Lgqm9x
MEDIA CONTACT: James Noonan, CA Fire Foundation; (800) 890-3213 (o); (760) 445-7094 (cell)
